basic.description: An introduction to the historical, psychological, sociological, and philosophical foundations of music education in North America. Three school-based observations may be included.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: An Introduction to Music Education

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite for MUSC MED, BMUS:  MUSC103 and registration in MUSC MED or BMUS plan
Prerequisite for MUSC GEN:  (MUSC101 or 102) and (MUSC171 or 289) and registration in a MUSC minor/general plan.
Corequisite    MUSC191.
